Name: Crystal Skill: Deus
Desc:
Combines the powers of Liyo and Makina and summons Deus. Deus summons up to 5 satellites that track and attack nearby enemies.
Deus does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Required Crystal Charge: 90 or higher
* Can be cast again after Crystal Charge is reset.
Required Skill: Liyo/Makina Lv. 20 or above

Desc.Old:
Combines the powers of Liyo and Makina and summons Deus. Deus summons up to 5 satellites that follow and attack nearby enemies.
Deus's attacks are not affected by the Damage Reflection effect.
Required Crystal Charge: 90 or more
- Can be cast again after Crystal Charge is reset.
Required Skill: Liyo/Makina Lv. 20 or above
